issues.message: [{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Wash hPSCs with 0.5 mM EDTA by removing E8 medium and replacing it with 0.6 mL of 0.5 mM EDTA per well of a 6-well plate.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Aspirate the EDTA solution, add 0.6 mL of Accutase per well.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Incubate for 3–5 min at 37 °C. Closely monitor cells under the tissue culture microscope until the cells start to round up.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Dissociate the cells from the plate with a P1000 pipette and pipette the cells gently up and down (2–3×) to break up aggregates and to generate single cells.'}, {'key': 'critical', 'value': 'Do not pipette the cells more than 2–3×, because single hPSCs are sensitive to mechanical stress.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Resuspend the cells in 5 mL of aggregation medium using a 5-mL serological pipette and collect the cells in a 15-mL Falcon tube.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Mix 10 μL of cell suspension and 10 μL of 0.1% Trypan blue solution and pipette 10 μL of the mixture onto a counting chamber slide.'}, {'key': 'note', 'value': 'Mix the cell suspension thoroughly before taking the counting aliquot to achieve accurate and consistent cell number measurements.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Count viable cells using an automated cell counter or under a microscope.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Centrifuge the cells at 300g for 5 min (22–23 °C) and aspirate the medium.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Resuspend the cells in fresh aggregation medium (3 mL per well) containing 50 μM Y-27632.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Place 3 mL of cell suspension per well into a 6-well low-attachment plate and incubate for 1 d until cell aggregates with smooth borders (>50- to 100-µm diameter) have been formed.'}, {'key': 'critical', 'value': 'Efficient aggregate formation is absolutely essential for the success of the protocol. Aggregation capacity varies between hPSC lines, and thus the incubation time may need to be adjusted from 1 d to 2 or even 3 d.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'One day after aggregates have formed (d0), transfer the aggregates to a 15-mL Falcon tube with a 10-mL serological pipette and wait for the aggregates to settle down by gravitation. Do not discard the 6-well plate; save it for later aggregate replating.'}, {'key': 'critical', 'value': 'Gentle treatment of aggregates is important. Always collect aggregates by gravitation. Centrifugation of cell aggregates is not recommended at any point in the protocol.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Use a 10-mL serological pipette to gently resuspend the aggregates (3 mL per well) in N2B27 medium + 12 µM CHIR99021 + 30 ng/mL BMP-4 and transfer the aggregates back to the low-attachment plate.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Incubate the cells. Use a P1000 pipette to quickly resuspend the aggregates once per day to avoid excessive fusion of aggregates. Incubate for 3 d to induce mesodermal differentiation.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'On day 3, transfer the aggregates to a 15-mL tube and wait for them to settle down by gravitation. Do not discard the 6-well plate; save it for later aggregate replating.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Resuspend the aggregates (3 mL per well) in N2B27 medium + 100 ng/mL VEGF-A + 2 µM forskolin and transfer the aggregates back to the low-attachment plates. Incubate for 2 more days.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Pipette the collagen I solution as described above. Carefully mix by pipetting up and down after adding PureCol.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Pipette the exact amount of collagen I solution into a fresh 15-mL Falcon tube and place it on ice.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Add Matrigel to collagen I solution and mix thoroughly by carefully pipetting up and down.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Add 0.5 mL of collagen I/Matrigel solution per 12-well plate and swirl the plate equally to distribute the solution in the wells.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Incubate the plate at 37 °C for 2 h for solidification.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Pipette the aggregates into 15-mL tubes with a 10-mL serological pipette. Collect aggregates by gravitation.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Wash the aggregates by aspirating the supernatant and adding 1 mL of StemPro-34 SFM complete medium. Repeat the wash once.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Use a P200 pipette to aspirate the medium; remove all remaining medium carefully.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Remove the 12-well plate containing the first layer of collagen I–Matrigel from the incubator and carefully add 0.5 mL of cell aggregate–collagen I–Matrigel solution to each well of the 12-well plate.'}, {'key': 'critical', 'value': 'The aggregates should be well distributed within the wells to avoid fusion of aggregates. Once the collagen I–Matrigel solution is at room temperature, the polymerization process will start. Do not rock the plate for longer than 30 s–1 min to avoid disturbing the solidification process.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Distribute the aggregates in the wells by rocking the plate back and forth. Once the aggregates are well distributed, slowly move the plate to the incubator.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Incubate the 12-well plate for 2 h at 37 °C for gel solidification.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Add prewarmed (37 °C) StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2 to induce blood vessel differentiation. Sprouting vessels should appear after 1–3 d after embedding.'}, {'key': 'critical', 'value': 'The medium must be properly prewarmed to ensure matrix integrity after addition of medium.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Change the medium after 3 d and then every other day.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Carefully aspirate the medium from a well using a P1000 pipette and add 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) solution in PBS for 20 min at room temperature.'}, {'key': 'critical', 'value': 'PFA fumes will affect cell viability in neighboring wells. If not all the wells of the 12-well plate are intended for fixation, use a spatula to carefully lift selected gels and use a spoon to transfer the matrix to another 12-well plate for fixation.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Remove the PFA solution and add PBS.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'To proceed with staining, cut the gels into smaller pieces (1/4–1/2 of a 12-well gel) under a stereomicroscope using extra-fine scissors and fine forceps. Avoid cutting through vascular networks.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Use forceps to transfer the gel fragments to a fresh 2-mL Eppendorf tube.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Under sterile conditions, transfer the gel with a sterile lab spoon to the lid of a 10-cm dish. Cover the lid with the 10-cm plate bottom and proceed to a horizontal laminar flow station equipped with a stereomicroscope.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Use two sterile 30-gauge needles to cut out single blood vessel networks and try to reduce the amount of excessive matrix surrounding the organoids.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Transfer single organoids (using a cut P1000 tip) to a 6-well low-attachment plate and add 5 mL of StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2 and incubate the organoids.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'One day after separating the blood vessel networks (d11), use a cut P1000 tip to transfer single organoids to low-attachment round-bottom 96-well ultra-low-attachment plates. Add fresh StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A.'}] is not of type 'object'
Missing required program key 'program_name' for device_kind 'incubator'.
Unknown registry value: viable cell count
issues.suggested_fix: Declare custom vocabulary or use a registry term.
